sentences.english: There is inevitable connection between the Manchu culture and the source of Jin culture.
sentences.chinese: 满族文化和金源文化之间存在着必然的关联。

sentences.english: But the snag was that the Manchus were outnumbered by Han troops in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 但那时，北京的汉族军人数量已经超过了满族军人。

sentences.english: All the troops were Manchu men.
sentences.chinese: 这个军队里的士兵都是满族人。

sentences.english: Finally, a Manchu invasion ended the Ming regime.
sentences.chinese: 最终，满族的入侵结束了明朝的统治。

sentences.english: After entering Shanhai Pass the transition of Manchu material culture expressed different trend in different areas.
sentences.chinese: 入关后满族物质文化变迁具有明显的地域性差异。

sentences.english: They were Manchus and not members of China’s Han majority.
sentences.chinese: 那就是他们来自满族，而非汉族。

sentences.english: CENTURY ago it was the "national language" of a vast empire.
sentences.chinese: 一个世纪之前，满族语被定为大清王朝的“国语”。

sentences.english: The Manchu valued their pelage which was believed to ward off rheumatism.
sentences.chinese: 满族人重视了应该挡住风湿病的他们的毛皮。

sentences.english: But in some remote rural areas Manchu ways held out longer.
sentences.chinese: 但是在一些偏远的乡村，满族习俗得到了更好的流传。

sentences.english: In some places, Manchus were massacred.
sentences.chinese: 在某些地方，满族人遭到了屠杀。

sentences.english: The Beijing flag Manchu nationality moves to the La Lin area in the history around reaches hundred year long time.
sentences.chinese: 京旗满族向拉林地区移驻的历史前后达百年之久。

sentences.english: The Manchu narration-chant story-telling has been basically handed down generation after generation by mouth and ear.
sentences.chinese: 满族讲唱说部主要在氏族内以口耳相传，代代承继。

sentences.english: The preserved Manchu literatures are a kind of cultural wealth left over by Manchu people.
sentences.chinese: 流传于世的满文图书是满族遗留至今的一笔文化财富。

sentences.english: It is the court dialect used by many Manchu emperors and noblemen.
sentences.chinese: 这是很多满族皇帝和贵族们使用的宫廷语言。

sentences.english: Nationalism and civil rights derived ideas, especially the anti-Manchu trick.
sentences.chinese: 民族主义与民权思想的推衍，尤招满族之忌。

sentences.english: However, Manchu language education didn’t come to match its political expansion.
sentences.chinese: 然而，满族语言教育无法适应其扩大政治影响的需要。
